Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities

Interface Capable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Actor, AxeOfGodrick, Barrack, Cage, CapabilitySet, Cliff, Club, Dirt, Dog, Enemy, FingerReaderEnia, FlaskOfCrimsonTears, Floor, GiantCrab, GiantCrayfish, GiantDog, GodrickSoldier, GoldenFogDoor, GoldenRune, GoldenSeed, GraftedDragon, Graveyard, Grossmesser, Ground, GustOfWind, HeavyCrossbow, HeavySkeletalSwordsman, Item, Land, LoneWolf, MerchantKale, PileOfBones, Player, PuddleOfWater, RemembranceOfTheGrafted, Rune, Scimitar, Sea, Skeletal, SkeletalBandit, Stormveil, Trader, Wall, WeaponItem
public interface Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.
